column4: at the risk of sounding insulting, have you read through the nvidia documentation
I had that stuff working once long ago -- but I installed dapper, and haven't bothered since, heh.  Lemme see if perusing the docs brings anything to mind
looks like what you're trying to do is covered in Appendix P.  In particular, I notice that the "metamodes" line only pertains to TwinView, and not to having seperate X displays
